entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
